patterns: Hi
Hello
Hey
Good morning
Good evening
responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi there! What can I help you with?
Greetings! How may I help you?

patterns: Goodbye
Bye
See you
Talk to you later
See you later
responses: Goodbye! Have a great day!
See you soon!
Take care! Talk to you later.

patterns: What can you do?
Tell me about yourself
Who are you?
What is this chatbot?
What are your functions?
responses: I am a virtual assistant here to help you with your banking needs, from checking account balances to loan applications.
I am your banking assistant, designed to help you with various queries related to your bank account and financial services.
I can assist you with information on your account, loans, transactions, and much more. How can I help you today?

patterns: Thank you
Thanks
Thanks a lot
Thank you so much
I appreciate it
responses: You're welcome!
Happy to help!
My pleasure!
